sn43.3:3.1: 3 Placing the Mind and Keeping it Connected
sn43.3:4.1: “And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?
sn43.3:4.2: Samadhi with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Samādhi without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Samādhi without placing the mind or keeping it connected. …”
